text: Shyamal Chakraborty (1944 - August 6, 2020) was an Indian politician. He was a member of the Rajya Sabha from 2008 to 2014. He was the transport minister of West Bengal from 1982 to 1996. He was also a member of the West Bengal Legislative Assembly from 1981 to 1996. Chakraborty died on August 6, 2020 at a hospital in Kolkata from cardiac arrest caused by COVID-19, aged 76. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from West Bengal Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Kolkata Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Shyamal Chakraborty
